DOC.detailed_description: The subject test enrollment week 20 , 24 , 28 , 32 , 36 , 40 pregnancy , well every 4 week postpartum 6 month . The following protocol use : 1 . Subjects also ask answer short health questionnaire . 2 . The following data record time : height , minimum stance width , circumference measurement chest , abdomen , hip thigh well supine fundal height . A full body side-profile photo also take determine curvature spine . 3 . A session questionnaire use determine subject fall noticed change daily activity . 4 . In seated position , follow measurement record : 1-minute heart rate variability ( HRV ) pace breathing , temporal scan body temperature , respiration rate , heart rate , blood pressure SpO2 ( last three measure bilaterally ) . 5 . Subject undergo posturography test use modified Clinical Testing Sensory Integration Balance ( mCTSIB ) protocol : four 30 test follow condition : eye open rigid surface ( NSEO ) , eye close rigid surface ( NSEC ) , eye open compliant surface ( PSEO ) , eye close compliant surface ( PSEC ) . 6 . At end posturography testing , heart rate , blood pressure SpO2 re-measured bilaterally stand seat position , seat HRV .
DOC.criteria: healthy woman le 20 week pregnant woman affect pathology and/or 20 week pregnant
